long_description: promoting traditional american values of self-reliance and personal responsibility. army old guard fife & drum corps, horses & so much more, while honoring our nation's veterans & gold star family members.
business_tags: patriotic products | honoring veterans | veterans stories | the greatest generation | national memorial | patriotic & military | gold star families | war memorial | u.s. army | travel photographs | color guards | train accidents | invisible wounds | heart balloons
generated_description: patriotic productions, legally known as patriotic productions inc., is a nonprofit organization dedicated to honoring military personnel and reviving american patriotism. the organization focuses on honoring veterans from the global war on terror and promoting traditional american values of self-reliance and personal responsibility. operates a traveling photographic war memorial, iraq - afghanistan national memorial, which includes 34 tribute towers honoring military personnel who served in combat zones and those who died in non-combat training accidents. the organization also offers exhibits such as the purple heart balloon, vietnam pow tiger cage, and a half-size replica of the tomb of the unknown for bookings. additionally, patriotic productions inc. organizes the flights of honor, which brings veterans of wwii, korea, vietnam, and the war on terror to washington d.c. to see their memorials. the organization also produces short films documenting veterans' stories to preserve their legacy.
